beer.beer_description: A satisfying blend of malts to provide a juicy backbone and a pale amber colour. An expansive blend of US hops give a resinous mouthfeel, big citrus and tropical fruit flavours, which are prominent, yet well balanced.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 485 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 98.

beer.beer_description: A satisfying blend of malts to provide a juicy backbone and a pale amber colour. An expansive blend of US hops give a resinous mouthfeel, big citrus and tropical fruit flavours, which are prominent, yet well balanced.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 395 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 80!

user.bio: Beer, it’s the best damn drink in the world.

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 465 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 94!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 245 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 50!

items.checkin_comment: Tasty solid pale ale, good aroma and easy drinking

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 75 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 16!
